name: Poker Face
lyrics:
Poker Face (扑克脸) - Lady Gaga
TME享有本翻译作品的著作权
Lyrics by：Lady Gaga/RedOne
   
Composed by：Lady Gaga/RedOne
   
Mum mum mum mah
   
Mum mum mum mah
   
Mum mum mum mah
   
Mum mum mum mah
   
Mum mum mum mah
   
I wanna hold 'em like they do in Texas please
我想要牵制他们 就像他们在德克萨斯赌场那样
Woo
   
Fold 'em let 'em hit me raise it baby stay with me
让他们注意到我 加注吧 宝贝 和我呆在一起吧
I love it
我喜欢这感觉
LoveGame intuition play the cards with spades to start
要有好运气还得凭直觉 出牌先出黑桃
And after he's been hooked I'll play the one that's on his heart
引他上钩之后 我就要亮出我的底牌赢得他
Oh woah-oh oh oh
   
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
   
I'll get him hot show him what I've got
我要让他兴奋起来 让他好好瞧瞧我的本事
Oh woah-oh oh oh
   
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
   
I'll get him hot show him what I've got
我要让他兴奋起来 让他好好瞧瞧我的本事
Can't read my can't read my
读不懂我
No he can't read my poker face
他读不懂我的扑克脸
She's got me like nobody
没有人像她那样如此地吸引我
Can't read my can't read my
读不懂我
No he can't read my poker face
他读不懂我的扑克脸
She's got me like nobody
没有人像她那样如此地吸引我
P-p-p-poker face f-f-f**k her face
扑克脸 扑克脸
Mum mum mum mah
   
P-p-p-poker face f-f-f**k her face
扑克脸 扑克脸
Mum mum mum mah
   
I wanna roll with him a hard pair we will be
我想要和他在一起 我们会是所向披靡的一对
Woo
   
A little gamblin' is fun when you're with me
你和我在一起时 哪怕是玩一场小小的赌博都会很有趣
I love it woo
我喜欢这感觉
Russian roulette is not the same without a gun
俄罗斯轮盘要是少了枪 那就完全不一样了
And baby when it's love if it's not rough it isn't fun fun
宝贝 爱情这玩意 不刺激就不好玩了
Oh woah-oh oh oh
   
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

我不会告诉你我爱你
Kiss or hug you
亲吻你或是拥抱你
'Cause I'm bluffin' with my muffin
因为我虚张声势想吓吓你
I'm not lyin' I'm just stunnin' with my love-glue-gunnin'

comments.content: 之前评论999+，在没成为QQ飞车手游游戏背景歌时[发火]
不科学啊就这么点评论
每当我听这首歌的时候，我感觉今天所有的难过都被我抛弃了，心情好起来了！！！
这个扑克脸是真的是好听。
